name.description: The name of the registry on jsrepo.com.

version.description: A semver compatible version of the registry on jsrepo.com or `package` to use the version from the `package.json`

readme.description: Path to the README file that will be packaged with the registry.

access.description: Who has access to your registry on jsrepo.com.

meta.description: Optional metadata to include in the manifest file.

authors.description: The names of the authors of this registry.

homepage.description: The URL to the registry homepage.

repository.description: The source repository for the registry. (Omit this if you are distributing from a git repository)

peerDependencies.description: A list of dependencies that are not installed by blocks or config files but are required for your registry to function in users projects.

oneOf.description: The version or version range that is supported by your registry.

version.description: The version or version range that is supported by your registry.

message.description: A message displayed to users when installing with an incompatible peer dependency.

configFiles.description: Any config files that should be included when initializing the registry.

path.description: Path where the config file lives.

expectedPath.description: Path to default to searching in the users project.

optional.description: Config file is optional and the user will be prompted accordingly.

dirs.description: Directories that contain the categories you want to build into the manifest.

outputDir.description: The directory to output the registry to. (Copies jsrepo-manifest.json + all required files)

includeBlocks.description: The names of the blocks that should be included in the manifest.

includeCategories.description: The names of the categories that should be included in the manifest.

excludeBlocks.description: The names of the blocks that should not be included in the manifest.

excludeCategories.description: The names of the categories that should not be included in the manifest.

listBlocks.description: List only the blocks with these names.

listCategories.description: List only the categories with these names.

doNotListBlocks.description: Do not list the blocks with these names.

doNotListCategories.description: Do not list the categories with these names.

excludeDeps.description: Remote dependencies that should not be added to the manifest.

preview.description: Display a preview of the blocks list.

rules.description: Configure rules when checking manifest after build.

no-category-index-file-dependency.description: Disallow depending on the index file of a category.

no-unpinned-dependency.description: Require all dependencies to have a pinned version.

require-local-dependency-exists.description: Require all local dependencies to exist.

max-local-dependencies.description: Enforces a limit on the amount of local dependencies a block can have.

no-unused-block.description: Disallow unused blocks. (Not listed and not a dependency of another block)

no-framework-dependency.description: Disallow frameworks (Svelte, Vue, React, etc.) as dependencies.

require-config-file-exists.description: Require all of the paths listed in `configFiles` to exist.

no-config-file-framework-dependency.description: Disallow frameworks (Svelte, Vue, React, etc.) as dependencies of config files.

no-config-file-unpinned-dependency.description: Require all dependencies of config files to have a pinned version.
